212.sentence: I've yet to find the limitation for this Hitachi (my only Hitachi tool, by the way) and quite frankly, I don't know that I have the muscle to push this machine any harder.

213.sentence: Bottom line is that at $160, this is an absolute steal.

214.sentence: I've got a buddy who's trying to offload his almost new $300 Speedmatic because he saw what this router can do.

215.sentence: It is without even a slight doubt, my new favorite.

216.sentence: The Hitachi M12V is a dream to work with, smooth starts, adjustable speeds, micro-adjustable depth, and plenty of power to spare.

217.sentence: The Hitachi M12V is a dream to work with, smooth starts, adjustable speeds, micro-adjustable depth, and plenty of power to spare.

218.sentence: The Hitachi M12V is a dream to work with, smooth starts, adjustable speeds, micro-adjustable depth, and plenty of power to spare.

219.sentence: The Hitachi M12V is a dream to work with, smooth starts, adjustable speeds, micro-adjustable depth, and plenty of power to spare.

220.sentence: I couldn't believe what I had been missing.

221.sentence: If you're looking for a 3hp plunge router, the Hitachi M12V is your best bet to stretch your equipment budget.

222.sentence: I'll be getting a second one for my router table!

223.sentence: I have been impressed with the power of the Hitachi M12V.

224.sentence: It doesn't bog down under load.

226.sentence: I use it on a router table, and it is works well.

227.sentence: The major reasons I didn't give it a five are:  One, I didn't think the fine adjustment worked well.

228.sentence: I replaced it with a Router Raizer and it works much better.

229.sentence: Two, the single wrench just doesn't work well.

230.sentence: The sliding latch is does not stay in place.

231.sentence: Other than this, I am very pleased with the router and would buy it again.

235.sentence: The fine adustment knob which came with the router was very difficult to use on a router table.

236.sentence: Finally, I gave up and I purchased a Router Razier.

237.sentence: I am seriously considering purchasing another wrench and just not using the "sliding wrench" which comes on the router.
